response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,500. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $12,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and look forward to discussing how we can collaborate.", "product_price": 10500}
